Subject: Attacking Rage
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He saw that Rage was damaged, and was about to hurt Feline.
He fired optic lazers at Rage, to pin her back. His shoulder rockets
poped up, and he fired two rockets at Rage.
